name: The Values Foundation
legal: Registered charitable non-profit organisation in Sweden
goal: To promote the rights and freedoms of Christian minority groups; and to help develop good policies and legislation based on moral values for the benefit of all. The Foundation makes submissions to both the European Parliament and the European Commission, engaging in the public consultative process and often attends public hearings at Brussels where it presents fact-based evidence on situations through Europe as to minority groups.
interests: Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives:
The Foundation particularly follow policies that concern Christian minorities in the EU.

We also follow any initiatives or legislation that deals with human-rights and anti-discriminatory proposals that affect religious minorities.
